summary: SRS LIGHT CAME ON AND WILL NOT GO OUT.  CAR WAS TAKEN TO DEALER FOR DIAGNOSIS.  DEALER SAYS SRS UNIT HAS INTERNAL FAILURE, (CODE 8-5)  NEEDS REPLACING.  UNIT FAILURE IS NOT COVERED BY MANUFACTURER.  THERE ARE SEVERAL COMPLAINTS SIMILAR TO THIS ONE, WHY IS HONDA NOT RECALLING THIS SYSTEM??   RESEARCH SHOWS MANY PROBLEMS WITH AIR BAG SYSTEMS ON THIS 1996 MODEL.*JB
